metadata.description: Bullet bank for remote-first U.S. job applications with Minnesota preference.

bullets.text: Activated a remote-first revenue desk spanning MN and nationwide advisors, converting Ameriprise-style consults into a $4.8M qualified pipeline in two quarters.
Piloted AI-driven forecasting automations that trimmed close cycles by 32% while holding GAAP compliance, boosting contribution margin by 6.4% for hybrid-free teams.
Mapped cross-sell plays between MN retirement portfolios and national SMB accounts, lifting attach rate from 1.4x to 2.1x without increasing headcount.
Replicated Ameriprise client loyalty rituals inside a fintech CRM, raising net promoter results by 18 points across fully remote households.
Integrated Reg BI guardrails directly into playbooks, keeping 100% of remote MN advisors audit-ready while shortening onboarding from 45 to 21 days.
Coached planners on Ameriprise-style Goals-Based Advice using AI nudges that surface next-best actions and surface plan drift inside distributed pods.
Sequenced multi-model call routing that pairs GPT ops with deterministic calculators, lifting first-touch resolution by 21% in remote advisor care.
Launched an AI safety net with reversible automations, logging every inference for FINRA-ready audits and giving remote teams rapid rollback control.
Packaged weekly composer-style labs so MN analysts co-design prompts, delivering 40+ reusable workflows without any on-prem dependencies.
Authored Zapier + Make blueprints that stitch ATS, CRM, and compliance trackers, eliminating 70 hours/month of swivel-chair updates for distributed teams.
Automated Ameriprise-style finance close packets, syncing ledger, CRM, and DocuSign artifacts so executives preview status without calling hybrid standups.
Built zero-touch onboarding runs that trigger background checks, LMS paths, and payroll setup the moment remote offers are signed.
Codified tierless support playbooks so remote service pods resolve 83% of advisor tickets asynchronously before escalation.
Turned raw call notes into sentiment dashboards, piping MN client wins back to marketing ops within 24 hours.
Expanded AI-searchable knowledge bases by 220 articles with clear Ameriprise compliance flags for distributed agents.
Linked campaign automation into Salesforce + Marketo loops, lifting MN-qualified inbound by 34% without live events.
Stood up AI-assisted content syndication that syndicates Ameriprise-thought leadership across remote advisor microsites in hours, not weeks.
Delivered CMO dashboards with spend-to-pipeline clarity, auto-refreshing from attribution data without any hybrid reporting cadence.
Forecasted agent load vs. licensing windows, enabling MN supervisors to shift coverage before queues spike.
Spun up asynchronous quality reviews with AI-generated scorecards so leaders coach without hybrid ride-alongs.
Unified advisor tech stack (CRM, VOIP, planning) with SSO guardrails to keep remote sessions secure and auditable.
Launched remote-first property tours using interactive calculators and Ameriprise-aligned finance flows for relocation clients.
Assembled compliance-ready data rooms that sync MLS, appraisal, and lending artifacts for distributed brokers in under an hour.
Automated investor reporting with vacancy, rent roll, and capex metrics surfaced weekly without on-site visits.
